node.statement: (Decomposition of the exponent) The full exponent of R_eps is Psi_eps(phi) = [4 lambda integral psi_eps :phi_eps^3: dx] + [-6 lambda integral psi_eps^2 :phi_eps^2: dx] + [4 lambda <psi_eps^3, phi_eps> + 2 delta_m_eps^2 <psi_eps, phi_eps> + <(-Delta+m^2)psi, phi>] + [-lambda ||psi_eps||_4^4 - delta_m_eps^2 ||psi_eps||_2^2 - (1/2)||psi||^2_{H^1}]. Define Psi_eps^{ren}(phi) = 4 lambda integral psi_eps :phi_eps^3: dx - 6 lambda integral psi_eps^2 :phi_eps^2: dx + 4 lambda <psi_eps^3, phi_eps> + <(-Delta+m^2)psi, phi> (all convergent terms). Define L_eps(phi) = 2 delta_m_eps^2 <psi_eps, phi_eps> (divergent linear term). Define K_eps = -lambda ||psi_eps||_4^4 - delta_m_eps^2 ||psi_eps||_2^2 - (1/2)||psi||^2_{H^1} (divergent constant). Then Psi_eps = Psi_eps^{ren} + L_eps + K_eps.
